task.title: Music Breaks
task.shortdesc: How to select a song for music breaks in BreakBuddy.

taskbody.context: These steps show you how to select a song in BreakBuddy during the music break. BreakBuddy offers short music clips to energize you during breaks.

step.cmd: Tap Music Break in the notification.
Select a song when the playlist opens.
Use the Next Song button to switch tracks.
